name: Broomin' Around
description:
Fly around on a magical broom, collect candy, and have fun for a while!

Broomin' Around is a 2.5D, Halloween themed, endless runner. You play as a witch, flying through a graveyard, and collecting candy for a yet unknown reason. Just have fun and enjoy the scenery!

The game is be playable on 📱mobile and 🖥️desktop via a 🕸️browser or you could download it for Windows.

Controls:

👇 Touch: Tap the left or the right sides of the screen to steer.
⌨️ Keyboard: Press the left or the right arrow keys to steer.
🎮 Gamepad: Use the left thumb-stick to steer. Press "A" to navigate the menus.

Developed by:
Art - @chrisiadraws (Instagram and Twitter)
Programming - @ongamex92 (Twitter)

The game has been created using the SGEEngine.
Play at your own risk, don't blame me if your computer catches fire!
